title: Boards account wrong?
body:
So quite a while ago (approx half a year) i've had the name Ace, the day I changed my name I noticed that the boards information was not mine, It was the previous owners, It didn't bother me after I changed my name because I had thought that It would just update in a couple of days, though now It bothers me that the information on my boards account isn't me... 
I would prefer not to change my name to fix this (IF that did work I wouldn't do it) but I was wondering if there was a way to get MY information on it. 

Thanks Ace~

replies.body: Hey are you able to check if this has been fixed?
Yeah everything is fixed thanks so much!!
We'll try to get this fixed up for you asap! Sorry for the inconvenience!
